objectives.blocking_reason: Fundamental architecture limitation - see analysis below

approaches_tried.reason: Plan incorrectly states 'G phi in HContent(M_t)' from 'G(G phi) in M_t'. HContent = {phi | H phi in M}, not {phi | G phi in M}. G formulas go into GContent, not HContent.

approaches_tried.approach: Forward chain propagation for negative times
approaches_tried.reason: Backward chain uses HContent (H formulas), not GContent (G formulas). There is no mechanism for G formulas to propagate in the backward chain.

approaches_tried.approach: Cross-chain propagation via shared base M_0
approaches_tried.reason: M_0 is shared but formulas added by Lindenbaum to M_t (t < 0) have no connection to M_0 or the forward chain. Only formulas in HContent of previous backward step transfer.

blocking_analysis.fundamental_issue: DovetailingChain uses two-chain architecture: forward chain extends GContent, backward chain extends HContent. G formulas propagate within forward chain; H formulas propagate within backward chain. There is no cross-propagation mechanism.
blocking_analysis.why_plan_approach_fails: The plan assumes G phi -> G(G phi) puts G phi into HContent for backward chain propagation. This is incorrect: G(G phi) means G phi is in GContent (since GContent = {phi | G phi in M}), not HContent (which is {phi | H phi in M}).

alternatives_considered.name: UnifiedChain approach
alternatives_considered.description: Combine GContent and HContent in every seed

alternatives_considered.name: RecursiveSeed approach
alternatives_considered.description: Pre-place all temporal witnesses before Lindenbaum

blocking_analysis.recommendation: The cross-sign sorries in DovetailingChain.lean are fundamentally unprovable with the current architecture. Plan v3 should be revised to either: (1) Use UnifiedChain approach which combines GContent/HContent, or (2) Use RecursiveSeed approach which pre-places witnesses, or (3) Document that DovetailingChain's two-chain architecture has this limitation and is superseded.
